subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Jews and Judaism
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah’s jockey, Victor Espinoza, paid homage at the grave site of a Jewish leader who some believe has the ear of a higher power.
snippet: American Pharoah’s jockey, Victor Espinoza, paid homage at the grave site of a Jewish leader who some believe has the ear of a higher power.
